[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/nv8b9g.jpg[/img] [FONT=Arial Black]We are still a new server and growing!
ArcaneRevolution is a enjoyable, exciting, and fun server which players can enjoy with great minigames. Donators also have amazing benefits such as x2 Dungeoneering XP and Shops! We also have active staff members and a friendly community.
ArcaneRevolution serves: - Donator & Super zone with good benifits - Custom miniquests - Tons of custom bosses to battle - Shops with good items - Working Squeal of Fortune with Lucky equipment - Great Players - Fun with players/staff - Friendly and helpful staff - Loyalty Points System - Weekly updates - Fullscreen mode - 24/7 Uptime - Unique
What are you waiting for? Join today![/CENTER]
